entry.title: Preface: Who Am I and What Is This Blog About
entry.content:
First of all, welcome to my blog.

My name is Philippe Ozil, I have been a Consultant for Bonitasoft since 2010 and I have been involved in 80+ customer projects. Starting from 2014, I have moved to the position of Technical Evangelist still for Bonitasoft.

I am opening this blog to share my experience about working with Bonita BPM, extending it and integrating it with third party technologies.

Enjoy your reading and I hope you will find this content useful.
